member.name: IWICStreamProvider.GetPersistOptions
member.summary: Gets the persist options used when initializing the component with a stream.
member.param: Pointer that receives the persist options used when initializing the component with a stream. If none were provided, WICPersistOptionDefault is returned.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStreamProvider.GetPreferredVendorGUID
member.param: Pointer that receives the preferred vendor GUID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStreamProvider.GetStream
member.summary: Gets the stream held by the component.
member.param: Pointer that receives a pointer to the stream held by the component.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStreamProvider.RefreshStream
member.summary: Informs the component that the content of the stream it's holding onto may have changed. The component should respond by dirtying any cached information from the stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICStreamProvider
member.summary: Exposes methods for a stream provider.
